mapper.insert: insert into contract( address, land_type, building_structure, building_usage, leased_part, land_area, building_area, leased_area, security_deposit, contract_deposit, balance, lease_start_date, lease_end_date, special_terms, landlord_address, landlord_phone_number, landlord_name, tenant_address, tenant_phone_number, tenant_name, office_address, office_name, office_regNum, office_number, represent_name, contract_number, agent_registNum, tenant_key, landlord_key, contract_time, agent_name, pre_contract ) VALUES ( #{address}, #{landType}, #{buildingStructure}, #{buildingUsage}, #{leasedPart}, #{landArea}, #{buildingArea}, #{leasedArea}, #{securityDeposit}, #{contractDeposit}, #{balance}, #{leaseStartDate}, #{leaseEndDate}, #{specialTerms}, #{landlordAddress}, #{landlordPhoneNumber}, #{landlordName}, #{tenantAddress}, #{tenantPhoneNumber}, #{tenantName}, #{officeAddress}, #{officeName}, #{officeRegistNum}, #{officeNumber}, #{representName}, #{contractNumber}, #{agentRegistNum}, #{tenantKey}, #{landlordKey}, now(), #{agentName}, #{preContract} )
